name: Federal budget authority for R&D and R&D plant, by budget function, ordered by FY 2019 R&D and R&D plant total: FYs 2019–21
description: Federal budget authority for R&D and R&D plant, by budget function, ordered by FY 2019 R&D and R&D plant total: FYs 2019–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_2019_actual
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.name: field_2020_preliminarya
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars and percent change

variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars and percent change

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Percent change is calculated on unrounded data. The data for each of the years reflects the application of the narrowed definition of development described by the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) in its Circular A-11 of July 2016.
sources: Agencies' submissions to OMB per MAX Schedule C, agencies' budget justification documents, and supplemental data obtained from agencies' budget offices.
